text:
the log names should at least contain "xindice" or "org.apache.xindice" so that
they don't collide with other applications' log names
creator: vladimir@bossicard.com

text:
I searched the code for any instance of 'getLog' and all are now at least 
prefixed with the package name.

If we want to switch to something like the class name, that's a different 
story.
creator: Kevin.Ross@iVerticalLeap.com
